sentences: Kae nalja, tuleb välja, et me oleme mõlemad Jaan Kuused!
context: The Estonian word 'nalja' is related to humor and laughter. It can refer to laughter itself, jokes, or fun activities. In the example sentence 'Kae nalja, tuleb välja, et me oleme mõlemad Jaan Kuused!', it seems to be used in an expression similar to 'laugh, you'll see that we're both Jaan Kuused!' suggesting something humorous or surprising will be revealed.
